description:
Deeply hurt mentally and physically, Sasuke is taken back to the Hidden Leaf Village by Guy. If only the medical specialist Tsunade were there...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Training Begins: I Will Be Strong!
Shugyou Kaishi Ore wa Zettee Tsuyoku Naru!
ฝึกหนักเพื่อแข็งแกร่งขึ้น
修行開始 オレはぜってー強くなる!
